name: Venture Spirit
overview:
Venture Spirit successfully leverages gamification for the purpose of innovation management. Using an online gaming platform that is based on a Venture Capital market metaphor, a diverse crowd of multiple hundreds of people are engaged to jointly tackle real-life strategic challenges. During a Venture Spirit game, innovative ideas are captured, enriched into well-balanced plans and prioritized according to their value.

The Venture Spirit gaming approach has already been deployed in various industry sectors, across several functional organizations and different age groups. It results in large active participation levels of up to 30%, while over 85% of the participants afterwards state that they would participate again. As Venture Spirit uses a managed service model, they can commit to quick and visible results in only a few months. Customers like Johnson & Johnson, GlaxoSmithKline, TE Connectivity, Philips, Siemens, and others have already experienced breakthrough innovation performance following the Venture Spirit approach. On average, a Venture Spirit game leads to a few dozens of plans in just a matter of weeks, creating several 10M €s of value in both revenue growth and cost reduction.
